name: Survival Island (Nikkolai Davenport)
description:
Hi, folks! My name is Nikko. I'm the developer of this game. Although it's really not much more than just a game environment. You can run around and explore the terrain. There are also a few weapons you can play with as well, but the game lacks any interactivity beyond that. When left idle though, the game does enter a demo mode that uses slow camera-pans and fly-throughs to showcase views around the island. Which can actually make for some pretty chill background visuals.

This game was made in 2013 using Unity 4, and was the first in a series of island themed game projects, including Isla Noir and The Island Project.

Thank you for your interest in this game. If you enjoy the experience, please consider making a small contribution to the project.

I appreciate the support. Thanks for playing!
